identity.mission: Create a modern, serious, yet engaging GovTech platform for AMVALI.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix GovTech seriousness with SaaS fluidity.
Emotion First: Trust, Efficiency, and Transparency.
Content is King: Data visualization and Roadmap are the heroes.
Zoom In: Focus on project details and status.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load in complex dashboards.

headings.usage: All section headers, page titles, and modal headers. Use tight tracking.

body.usage: General text, data tables, form inputs.

mono.usage: Technical IDs, code snippets, or specific data metrics.

primary.name: Slate Authority
primary.usage: Main navigation, primary text, strong borders.

secondary.name: Infrastructure Teal
secondary.usage: Primary actions, progress bars, active states.

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for hover states
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly on sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50

custom_components.name: StarRating
custom_components.description: Interactive 5-star rating component for project prioritization. Uses Amber-500 for active stars.

custom_components.name: RoadmapTimeline
custom_components.description: Horizontal scrolling timeline with interactive nodes representing project stages.

custom_components.name: MetricCard
custom_components.description: Clean card with icon, label, value, and trend indicator.

custom_components.name: ProjectCard
custom_components.description: Card displaying project summary, status badge, and mini-roadmap.

instructions.buttons: Use 'pill' shapes or slightly rounded corners (rounded-md). Primary buttons should be Teal-600. Secondary buttons Slate-100.
instructions.cards: Flat white background, subtle border (slate-200), no shadow by default, shadow-md on hover.
instructions.inputs: Standard Shadcn inputs, focus ring color Teal-600.
instructions.tables: Clean rows, hover effect (bg-slate-50), sticky header.

hero_background.alt: Aerial view of modern city infrastructure
hero_background.usage: Login page background, Dashboard hero banner (with overlay)

technical_context.usage: Project creation wizard, 'Technical Queue' section header

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA compliance).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'Portal IntraAMVALI'. Focus on the 'Roadmap' and 'Star Prioritization' features as they are core differentiators. Use the provided images to create a professional GovTech atmosphere. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the main dashboard. Ensure the 'Teal' and 'Slate' color scheme is applied consistently.
